Marshall Islands authorities have introduced a number of precautionary measures, including a total suspension of international travellers coming into RMI.

Quarantine requirement:
Marshall Islands authorities have introduced a number of precautionary measures, including a total suspension of international travellers coming into RMI.
column4: US State Dept. COVID-19 Country Specific Information/ Foreign travel advice, Gov.UK/ OSAC Travel Advisories/
column5:
Latest News

International Restrictions:
*Entry rules in response to coronavirus (COVID-19): Marshall Islands authorities have introduced a number of precautionary measures, including a total suspension of international travellers coming into RMI. Domestic air travel between Majuro and Kwajalein on international airlines is also no longer permitted.

Internal Restrictions:
Domestic passenger air travel between Kwajalein and Majuro will only be permitted on Air Marshall Islands.
